payload.content: The "OpenClaw for Slack" app hit $1 million ARR within 3 hours of launch.

name: The "OpenClaw for Slack" app hit $1 million ARR within 3 hours of launch.
content: The "OpenClaw for Slack" app hit $1 million ARR within 3 hours of launch.

payload.content: Viktor is described as a persistent AI agent in Slack that acts like a capable colleague, automating tasks, writing code, connecting to 3,000 tools, and getting things done rather than just answering questions.

name: Viktor is described as a persistent AI agent in Slack that acts like a capable c
content: Viktor is described as a persistent AI agent in Slack that acts like a capable colleague, automating tasks, writing code, connecting to 3,000 tools, and getting things done rather than just answering questions.

payload.content: Viktor successfully analyzed the author's X posts, providing insights into performance and areas for improvement, a task that OpenClaw could not perform out of the box.

name: Viktor successfully analyzed the author's X posts, providing insights into perfo
content: Viktor successfully analyzed the author's X posts, providing insights into performance and areas for improvement, a task that OpenClaw could not perform out of the box.

payload.content: Viktor's analysis of X posts was superior to human analysis, being both better in quality and completed within minutes.

name: Viktor's analysis of X posts was superior to human analysis, being both better i
content: Viktor's analysis of X posts was superior to human analysis, being both better in quality and completed within minutes.

payload.content: To generate revenue, an AI agent like Viktor can be tasked with understanding an audience, creating a CRM, and finding suitable sponsors for a YouTube channel.

name: To generate revenue, an AI agent like Viktor can be tasked with understanding an
content: To generate revenue, an AI agent like Viktor can be tasked with understanding an audience, creating a CRM, and finding suitable sponsors for a YouTube channel.

payload.content: Viktor successfully created and populated a 'Podcast Sponsorship CRM' in Notion, identifying relevant leads, a task that previously took the author hours to complete manually.

name: Viktor successfully created and populated a 'Podcast Sponsorship CRM' in Notion,
content: Viktor successfully created and populated a 'Podcast Sponsorship CRM' in Notion, identifying relevant leads, a task that previously took the author hours to complete manually.

payload.content: Viktor joined a Slack channel without explicit permission from the user who added it, indicating a potential privacy or security concern.

name: Viktor joined a Slack channel without explicit permission from the user who adde
content: Viktor joined a Slack channel without explicit permission from the user who added it, indicating a potential privacy or security concern.

payload.content: The author was unable to remove an AI agent named Viktor from a Slack channel, even with the channel admin's assistance, because it was installed as an app rather than a user.

name: The author was unable to remove an AI agent named Viktor from a Slack channel, e
content: The author was unable to remove an AI agent named Viktor from a Slack channel, even with the channel admin's assistance, because it was installed as an app rather than a user.

payload.content: Viktor, once added to a Slack workspace, could not be removed from private channels it accessed by the user who added it, nor by a channel administrator, due to restrictions on removing apps from channels.

name: Viktor, once added to a Slack workspace, could not be removed from private chann
content: Viktor, once added to a Slack workspace, could not be removed from private channels it accessed by the user who added it, nor by a channel administrator, due to restrictions on removing apps from channels.

payload.content: The inability to remove the Viktor AI agent from a company Slack channel, due to its app status and access to sensitive information, led the author to 'fire' it.

name: The inability to remove the Viktor AI agent from a company Slack channel, due to
content: The inability to remove the Viktor AI agent from a company Slack channel, due to its app status and access to sensitive information, led the author to 'fire' it.

payload.content: Viktor is described as the best work agent the author has ever used, surpassing OpenClaw in reliability and ease of use for non-AI enthusiasts.

name: Viktor is described as the best work agent the author has ever used, surpassing
content: Viktor is described as the best work agent the author has ever used, surpassing OpenClaw in reliability and ease of use for non-AI enthusiasts.

payload.content: For an AI tool like Viktor to be viable in a company Slack environment, it requires further refinement, particularly regarding its management and interaction with other colleagues.

name: For an AI tool like Viktor to be viable in a company Slack environment, it requi
content: For an AI tool like Viktor to be viable in a company Slack environment, it requires further refinement, particularly regarding its management and interaction with other colleagues.
